ocr_markdown:
```markdown
6. Mark for Review

The function $$ f(x) = -30x + 310 $$ gives the predicted height above the ground $$ f(x) $$, in feet, of a model airplane $$ x $$ minutes after it begins to descend. What is the predicted height above the ground, in feet, of the model airplane 2 minutes after it begins to descend?

A) 60  
B) 250  
C) 280  
D) 370  
```

questions.question_text: The function f(x) = -30x + 310 gives the predicted height above the ground f(x), in feet, of a model airplane x minutes after it begins to descend. What is the predicted height above the ground, in feet, of the model airplane 2 minutes after it begins to descend?
questions.explanation: Substitute x=2 into f(x): f(2) = -30(2) + 310 = -60 + 310 = 250 feet.
